name: Too Many Bricks on the Dancefloor
name_original: Too Many Bricks on the Dancefloor
description:
Clear the dancefloor from too many bricks in this fast paced skill-based block destruction mania with an astonishingly simple but mind bendingly addicting principle. Transform yourself from a hesitant tapper into a record-breaking brick masher. Break highscores, challenge your friends with simple online leaderboards.

Unfortunately the leaderboards are not available in the WebGL build.
